body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Eugene Alexander and the customer's name is Katherine Griffin.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Eugene Alexander, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Katherine! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed with all the motorcycle options you have.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Katherine. Choosing the right motorcycle can be a tough decision. May I ask how long you have been riding?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been riding for about three years.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's wonderful! And could you also provide me with your zip code? It will help us find the best options available for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And lastly, may I have your email address to send you some recommendations?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you so much for that information, Katherine. I will compile some options based on your preferences!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's my pleasure! Thank you for your time today, Katherine. I look forward to helping you find the perfect motorcycle!
